title: QUESTION: End of Season rewards
body:
What are the flex queue end of season rewards for those that reach flex queue challenger, or top n in flex queue challenger? 

Will flex queue players in challenger still get challenger borders, jackets, etc..?

edit: ''etc''

replies.body: No idea fam!  We don't have any details on this until we get closer towards the end of the season.  I'm sure we'll be posting the plan on the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page as we near the end.  Hang tight!
